data.name: Metro Simulator 2
data.detailed_description:
Metro Simulator 2 is a unique game featuring recreated Moscow Metro and realistic train controls.

Various game modes


In Free Mode, you can choose your role: Train driver or Passenger. You can choose station or dead end where you start the game by yourself. You can drive on the line without passengers, but in any time you can set the desired route and set up the schedule. It's important to follow it and depart from stations in time!

When playing as a passenger, you can freely explore stations and ride AI-controlled trains.

In Scenarios, conditions are pre-determined. You'll face different unusual situations which may occur in Metro. Listen to dispatcher's orders and follow them.

Moscow Metro Line 6: 24 stations, various tunnels and objects inside them


By using modern technologies, the game delivers all the experience of Russian capital's subway. Stations on this line were built in different time periods, so they reflect their era's developments.

Advanced speed control system and AI-controlled trains


You're not driving the only train driver on the line! AI-controlled trains are also driving on their routes in accordance with their schedule. Speed control system will allow to prevent collisions and other unwanted events. Keep an eye on speedometer value and traffic lights ahead, and your drive should be alright.

Main characters of the game are trains


Three trains are featured in the game, and each one has its own controls. They are equipped with all basic functionality for safe passenger transportation.

data.short_description: Metro Simulator 2 is a unique game featuring recreated Moscow Metro and realistic train controls.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Polish*, Russian*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later 64-bit os required
  • Processor: 1.9ghz Intel i5-equivalent processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or similar AMD Radeon (no support for onboard cards)
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later 64-bit os required
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
